scripts.build:core: npm run build && rimraf core && copyfiles src/core/package.json -f core && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayer.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayer.js lib/umd/YuanPlayer.js core
scripts.build:theme-yuan: npm run build && rimraf theme-yuan && copyfiles src/themes/yuan/package.json -f theme-yuan && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemeYuan.js theme-yuan
scripts.build:theme-monday: npm run build && rimraf theme-monday && copyfiles src/themes/blueMonday/package.json -f theme-monday && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemeBlueMonday.js theme-monday
scripts.build:theme-pinkflag: npm run build && rimraf theme-pinkflag && copyfiles src/themes/pinkFlag/package.json -f theme-pinkflag && copyfiles lib/cjs/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.js lib/mjs/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.js lib/umd/YuanPlayerThemePinkFlag.js theme-pinkflag
